statements: SELECT * FROM AddressBookUsers WHERE user_id = 1;

SELECT DISTINCT first_name FROM AddressBookUsers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';

SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT u.first_name, a.address_line1, a.city FROM users u JOIN addresses a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE u.user_id = 3;
SELECT c.contact_name, u.first_name, u.last_name, a.city FROM contacts c JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id JOIN addresses a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE c.contact_id = 2;
SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, a.address_line1, a.city, a.state, a.zipcode FROM users u JOIN addresses a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.city = 'New York';

SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, email, phone_number FROM users ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM contacts JOIN addresses ON contacts.user_id = addresses.user_id WHERE contacts.first_name = 'John';

SELECT users.username, contacts.first_name, addresses.city FROM users JOIN contacts ON users.user_id = contacts.user_id JOIN addresses ON users.user_id = addresses.user_id ORDER BY users.username ASC, contacts.first_name DESC;

SELECT user_name, user_phone, user_address FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM contacts WHERE contact_address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY contact_name DESC;
